Detailed Description

ARMA view: container for (vectorial) ARMA processes.

A view for ARMA parametrization. It defines a general (V)ARMA process, which can be written as

where A,B are square matrix of dimension d equal to the dimension of the input and output vectors x,y. If the order of the part MA q is equal to zero the process is an AR process. If the order of the AR part p is equal to zero the process is an MA process. Note that the matrix is assumed to be the identity.

◆ GetAR()

const double& tsa::ARMAView::GetAR ( int  i,
unsigned int  channel = 0 
) const
inline

This method gives the value of the AR[i] coefficient for one of the channels. It is assumed that the VARMA process is diagonal, which means that there is and independent ARMA process for each channel.

Parameters
ithe index of the AR coefficient
channelthe channel
Returns
the value of the AR[i] coefficient
